articles.title: General election: Tories announce 'Triple Lock Plus' pension allowance - BBC.com
articles.description: The Conservatives pledge to raise the tax-free pension allowance by at least 2.5% a year if they win the election.
articles.content:
Sam Francis,Political reporter
The Conservatives have promised to raise the tax-free pension allowance via a "Triple Lock Plus" if they win the general election.

articles.title: North Korea says rocket carrying satellite exploded in flight - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Pyongyang says its attempt to put another spy satellite into orbit ends in failure, according to state news agency KCNA.
articles.content:
North Korea says its attempt to launch a rocket with a spy satellite on board has failed after South Koreas military reported the launch of an unidentified projectile.

articles.author: Ben Schoon
articles.title: YouTube videos are skipping to the end for users with adblockers - 9to5Google
articles.description: Some users with adblockers installed have noticed that videos are skipping straight to the end all of the sudden.
articles.content:
For many users with an adblocker employed, YouTube videos are suddenly starting to skip to the end of the video.
Over the past few months, YouTube has been enforcing its rule against the use of adbl… [+1623 chars]
